original_text: So all the service of the Lord was prepared that day, to keep the Passover and to offer burnt offerings on the altar of the Lord, according to the command of King Josiah.
korean_text: 이와 같이 당일에 여호와를 섬길 일이 다 준비되매 요시야 왕의 명령대로 유월절을 지키며 번제를 여호와의 제단에 드렸으며

sentences.original_text: So all the service of the Lord was prepared that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 날 주의 모든 섬김은 준비되었고

sentences.original_text: and to offer burnt offerings on the altar of the Lord
according to the command of King Josiah
